Stay connected with farmer success stori: Kasance da labaran manoma, bayanan kasuwa, da sabuntawa
Building farmer-to-farmer and farmer-to-: Gina haɗin kai tsakanin manoma da ƙwararru a fadin Yammacin Afirka.

Name: Suna
Subject: Take
If you have any query, please contact us: Idan kana da tambaya, da fatan za a tuntuɓe mu
When Farmers Connect, Communities Prospe: Lokacin da manoma suka haɗu, al’umma suna bunƙasa
We connect crop farmers, herders, and fi: Muna haɗa manoma, makiyaya, da masu kamun kifi da jagora, albarkatu masu inganci, da farashi nagari cikin harsunan gida har ma ba tare da intanet ba.
We know farming is hard work. Whether yo: Mun san aikin noma da wahala. Ko kana shuka amfanin gona, kiwo, ko kamun kifi, ka cancanci samun farashi mai kyau.
Many farmers work alone. Middlemen take: Yawancin manoma suna aiki su kaɗai. Masu tsaka-tsaki suna karɓar riba. Matsalar yare na hana dama. Manoma nagari suna fama yayin da wasu ke ci gaba.
That's why we built BubeTech. We connect: Saboda haka muka kirkiro BubeTech. Muna haɗa kowane manomi - daga ƙananan lambu zuwa manyan kiwo - da ilimi, kayan aiki masu inganci, da farashi mai adalci. Wayarka zata zama abokin aikin nomanka. Muryarka tana da muhimmanci. Al'umarka zata ƙara ƙarfi.
Farm smarter, live better. When farmers: Noma da hankali, rayuwa da kyau. Lokacin da manoma suka haɗu, kowa na cin gajiyar sa.
Helping Farmers Adapt, Grow, and Succeed: Taimakawa manoma su daidaita, su bunƙasa, kuma su ci nasara ta hanyoyin da suka dace.
Why Choose Bubetech: Me yasa za a zaɓi Bubetech?
Get current market prices and know the t: Sami farashin kasuwa na yanzu kuma san darajar amfanin gona, dabbobi, da kifi naka.
Get advice from agricultural experts and: Sami shawarwari daga masana harkar noma da manoma masu ƙwarewa.
Get help in your local language through: Sami taimako da harshenka ta kiran murya, SMS, ko app. Yana aiki da ko ba tare da intanet ba akan kowanne waya.
Find quality resources like seeds, grazi: Nemo kayayyakin noma masu inganci irin su iri, filayen kiwo, wuraren kamun kifi da sauransu. Hada kai da manoma don raba albarkatu.
Do I need a smartphone to use BubeTech?: Ina bukata wayar hannu mai fasaha don amfani da BubeTech?
How do I register for BubeTech?: a yaya zan yi rajista a BubeTech?
Why does BubeTech start with pastoralist: Me yasa BubeTech ta fara da makiyaya?
Why work through associations instead of: Me yasa kuke aiki ta hanyar ƙungiyoyi maimakon kai tsaye da manoma?
Contact us for current pricing. The more: Tuntuɓe mu don sanin kudin yanzu. Yawan manoma a al'ummarku da suka shiga, shine mafi kyawun farashi ga kowa.
No! BubeTech works on any phone - basic: A'a! BubeTech yana aiki akan kowane irin waya - wayoyin gida, wayoyin fasaha, ko wayoyin hannu. Matasan jakadu suna gudanar da rajista ta amfani da manhajjar mu.
Wait for youth ambassadors from your ass: Jira matasan jakadu daga ƙungiyarku su ziyarci yankinku. Za su yi muku rajista ta amfani da manhajjar mu kuma su taimake ku samun katin shedar dijital.
We speak Fulfulde, Hausa, Yoruba, Igbo,: Muna magana da Fulfulde, Hausa, Yoruba, Igbo, Ingilishi, Faransanci, Fotugal, da sauran harsunan Afirka ta Yamma da yawa.
Pastoralists face the most challenging i: Makiyaya suna fuskantar wahalar keɓewa sosai kuma suna da tsarin ƙungiya mai ƙarfi da ke ba da damar aiwatarwa mai inganci. Nasara a nan tana gina tushe don hidimar dukkan al'ummomin noma.
Associations have established trust and: Ƙungiyoyi sun kafa amana kuma sun fi sanin membobinsu. Muna ƙarfafa ƙungiyoyi domin su ba da amfani ga manoma tare da mutunta tsarin al'umma na gargajiya.
